channel.title: Need help with my DropEditor.bat
channel.description:
Hey can anyone please help me fix my DropEditor.bat
[CODE] @echo off title Npc Drop Editor java -client -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* DropEditor.java pause [/CODE]
Location of the DropEditor.java - C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Cinemascape\bin\com\rs\tools\DropEditor.java
What happens when I run it is it says:
Error: Could not find or load main class DropEditor.java Press any key to continue...
Thank you to anyone who replies.

item.title: Need help with my DropEditor.bat
item.dc:creator: @Mollett Mollett
item.description:
@Mollett wrote:

mgl:

try removing the .java at the end of that file name. As far as I know that is never needed when running, because you don’t run your .java you run your .class.

Hey, thank you for your reply I have removed it and I get the following error:

Error: Could not find or load main class DropEditor
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my DropEditor.bat
item.dc:creator: @Mollett Mollett
item.description:
@Mollett wrote:

Hey can anyone please help me fix my DropEditor.bat

@echo off
title Npc Drop Editor
java -client -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* DropEditor.java
pause

Location of the DropEditor.java - C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Cinemascape\bin\com\rs\tools\DropEditor.java

What happens when I run it is it says:

Error: Could not find or load main class DropEditor.java
Press any key to continue…

Thank you to anyone who replies.

Read full topic
